description:
Would you like to use your creative expertise to become an entrepreneur? What idea, product, or service, would you like to create? Are you hoping to have the next new entrepreneurial idea that will make an impression in the creative professional world? If so, this course is a great starting point.

In this course, you will:

  • Explore current and credible resources for entrepreneurs in today’s global economy
  • Hear the stories of creative entrepreneurs who have experienced success in numerous fields
  • Make connections with like-minded colleagues through course discussions
  • Build your understanding of designing business models
  • Learn about creative sources for funding and strategies for supporting your entrepreneurial venture
  • Examine the skills and dispositions creative professionals need to successfully start new businesses, consultancies, or freelance operations
  • Explore the exciting world of entrepreneurship and begin to apply your learning in a real-world context

All of the course content is designed to benefit creative professionals who want to learn more about entrepreneurship as well as those who are in beginning stages of starting an entrepreneurial venture.

Module 1: Welcome to the Course
Explore what it means to be a creative entrepreneur in our globally connected world.

Module 2: Welcome to the Field
Hear from entrepreneurs at different stages in their journeys.

Module 3: Making Connections
Begin to fill your “entrepreneurial backpack” with resources and connections that will keep you resourced through your entrepreneurial journey.

Module 4: Finding your Entrepreneurial Voice
Explore ways to connect with other entrepreneurs.

Module 5: Designing a Business Model
Examine what is involved in designing a business model.

Module 6: Funding Your Entrepreneurial Venture
Examine how to fund your new idea, product, or service.

Module 7: Building Your Brand Identity
Explore how to define your product or service in impactful ways.

Module 8: Further Exploration
Explore further resources that will continue to nurture your entrepreneurial interests.

Bring your professional experiences and ideas to this course and apply your learning in a real-world context. Your passion, experience, and curiosity are incredible assets in further opening your mind and learning about entrepreneurship.
title: Exploring Entrepreneurship for the Creative Professions
